Package de.oth.blocklib.ai.python

Class PythonAISensorAndMovementProvider

java.lang.Object
de.oth.blocklib.ai.python.PythonAISensorAndMovementProvider
public class PythonAISensorAndMovementProvider
extends java.lang.Object
Provides the internal mechanics for the python sensors and the movement calls
Author:
Raphael Neudert

    • getAIAlignmentToTarget

      public float getAIAlignmentToTarget()
      Currently reduced to the angle between the 2 dimensional vectors (y was set to 0)
      Returns:
      the degree between the current direction and the direction to the target
      (the value is positive if the target is left from the camera and negative if the target is right)

    • isAreaInFrontOfAIAccessable

      public int isAreaInFrontOfAIAccessable()
      Sensor for the area directly in front of the AI returns 0 for free returns 1 for jump required returns 2 for wall or hole

      true if all blocks of the given level are empty
